mapper.insert: insert into tradeorder (id, transactional_number, payType, settleBankName, cardType, settleCardNo, money, fee, settleMoney, eq_id, createdAt) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transactionalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settlebankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settlecardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settlemoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{eqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tradeorder set transactional_number = #{transactionalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payType = #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settleBankName = #{settlebankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardType = #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settleCardNo = #{settlecardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, settleMoney = #{settlemoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, eq_id = #{eqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdAt = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, transactional_number, payType, settleBankName, cardType, settleCardNo, money, fee, settleMoney, eq_id, createdAt from tradeorder where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, transactional_number, payType, settleBankName, cardType, settleCardNo, money, fee, settleMoney, eq_id, createdAt from tradeorder
